person.persName: John L. Irvan (Calloway Co. state rep)

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, farmer and politician. Kentucky native. Married to Rebecca J. Irvan. Father of William Irvan, Emma J. Irvan, George T. Irvan, and Ann Elizabeth Irvan. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Calloway County from 1853 to 1857. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Calloway County from 1859 to 1863. Farmer in Calloway County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved people in 1860.
